Summary: many pea sized white star like white objects that move.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy mother had told me that she had seen, on mulptiple ocasions, strange activity in the sky at night. Our property is far from any major city, so the sky is very starry at night. Aproximatley 12:00 am she took me outside so that I could wittness this event for my own eyes. As best as I can describe of what I saw, is as follows: For a few minutes nothing moved. Then I saw what looked like a star moving north, then came to a complete stop. It then proceded to go the exact opposite direction, in which it then stoped again. This time, it began to fly around in circles, and proceded to go south west, then came to a complete halt, then dissapeared. The End
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cistern
There were no other sightings in Cistern on or around October 23rd 2008
